nodes.text: 2012 Topps Star Wars Galactic Files Series 1

2012 Topps Star Wars Galactic Files Series 1 is a trading-card set released by Topps on October 3, 2012. The 350-card base set features four categories: Characters, Vehicles, Creatures and Factions. Another set of cards, 2013 Topps Star Wars Galactic Files Series 2, was released on August 9, 2013.
Mistakes can be found on some cards:
